plot outline: Four Pillars of Basement is a psycho thriller that shows human fragilities and capricious nature. Protagonist Samir is a conniving person and works as a security officer at the mall. He has a crush on Priya, working in one of the offices in the mall. His twin brother, a lunatic and a mad person elopes to the mental hospital to add more confusion to the plot. The movie unfolds dramatically as the heroine is trapped in the basement and is unable to get out. Whosoever comes to help her, meets with a tragic death. In the climax, will the hero of the movie- as the twin lunatic be held responsible? Will the security officer be punished?
title: Four Pillars of Basement
plot: FBI comes at the end to do investigation. ..... Another big tycoon intervenes to secure his position

_Four Pillars of Basement_ (qv) is a psycho thriller that shows human fragilities and capricious nature. Protagonist Samir is a conniving person and works as a security officer at the mall. He has a crush on Priya, working in one of the offices in the mall. His twin brother, a lunatic and a mad person elopes to the mental hospital to add more confusion to the plot. The movie unfolds dramatically as the heroine is trapped in the basement and is unable to get out. Whosoever comes to help her, meets with a tragic death. In the climax, will the hero of the movie- as the twin lunatic be held responsible? Will the security officer be punished?::Ashwani Shukla (Publicist)
